tests.name: html-testing
tests.setup: export PATH="/home/runner/.local/bin:$PATH"; export PATH="/usr/local/bin:$PATH"; pip3 install requests==2.22.0; pip3 install selenium==3.141.0;pip3 install flake8;flake8 . --count --select=E9,F63,F7,F82 --show-source --statistics;flake8 . --count --exit-zero --max-complexity=10 --max-line-length=127 --statistics; sudo -H pip3 install pytest
